item.title: Trump seeks quick deposition of Rupert Murdoch in Jeffrey Epstein letter defamation case
item.description: President Donald Trump has angrily denied writing his then-friend Jeffrey Epstein a letter marking his 50th birthday.

item.title: Trump: Global baseline tariff will likely be 15% to 20%
item.description: The figures are significant because they represent a major increase from the 10% baseline tariff Trump announced in April of this year.

item.title: Trump trade rep sets low bar for China trade talks, no 'enormous breakthrough' expected
item.description: Top officials from President Donald Trump's administration are set to meet in Sweden with their Chinese counterparts for economic talks.

item.title: Trump gives Russia less than two weeks to reach peace deal with Ukraine
item.description: President Donald Trump said he is "disappointed" in Russian President Vladimir Putin over his continued military aggression in Ukraine.

item.title: Trump says he cut ties with Jeffrey Epstein because 'he stole people who worked for me'
item.description: Trump's past friendship with Jeffrey Epstein has come under scrutiny after Attorney General Pam Bondi said she would not release files about Epstein.
